portfolio.title: My-Planner
portfolio.description: myPlanner is a task planner web app with google auth wherein you can drag n drop tasks & subtasks, add multiple boards and write a description using markdown

portfolio.title: MERN Blog
portfolio.description: A blog website wherein users can submit blog posts and view blogs written by other users in their feed. Once signed in Users can comment & like each blog. Built using ReactJS at front-end & NodeJS at the back-end and deployed to Heroku.

portfolio.title: School ERP
portfolio.description: An ERP system built in Django for schools to manage marks, homework, notices, attendance, fees, student & employee registration. Separate dashboard for students, teachers and administrator.

portfolio.title: Recollections
portfolio.description: Simple social media app that allows users to share their memories with images and descriptions. It has user authentication via email(JWT) and Google OAuth

portfolio.title: Skynox Website
portfolio.description: Implemented end to end Skynox website built from scratch during my internship at Skynox. It is built with GatsbyJS(React Framework)

portfolio.title: Shopping Cart
portfolio.description: A CRUD shopping cart web app in ReactJS and Bootstrap implemented using firebase real-time database, authentication and firebase hosting.

duty: Added clevertap and google analytics events to the PWA.
